mapper.select: SELECT sub.FORUM_NUMBER, sub.party_number, sub.USER_NICKNAME, sub.USER_TIER, tf.FORUM_CATEGORY, tf.FORUM_TITLE, tf.FORUM_DATE, sub.party_state FROM TBL_FORUM tf join(SELECT tp.party_number, USER_NICKNAME, USER_TIER, tp.forum_number, tp.party_state FROM TBL_USER tu JOIN (SELECT * FROM TBL_PARTY WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{num}) tp ON tu.USER_NUMBER = tp.user_number) sub ON tf.FORUM_NUMBER = sub.FORUM_NUMBER ORDER BY sub.party_number DESC

SELECT sub.FORUM_NUMBER, sub.PARTY_NUMBER, tu.USER_NICKNAME,tu.USER_TIER, sub.forum_category, sub.forum_title, sub.FORUM_DATE, sub.PARTY_STATE FROM TBL_USER tu JOIN (SELECT tp.PARTY_NUMBER, tp.USER_NUMBER,tf.forum_title, tf.FORUM_DATE, tp.PARTY_STATE, tf.FORUM_NUMBER, tf.FORUM_CATEGORY FROM TBL_PARTY tp JOIN (SELECT FORUM_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, FORUM_title, FORUM_DATE, FORUM_CATEGORY FROM TBL_FORUM WHERE FORUM_CATEGORY = '모집' AND USER_NUMBER = #{num}) tf ON tp.FORUM_NUMBER = tf.forum_number) sub ON tu.USER_NUMBER = sub.USER_NUMBER ORDER BY sub.party_number DESC
